product.title: Chenille Mink
product.description: Chenille mink made to measure vertical blind.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood's chenille satin is discreet and demure in a matt, creamy white finish. This authentic-looking faux wood is formed from high quality, hardwearing pvc, making it both sturdy, wipe-clean, and water-resistant - and therefore ideal for any family-centred room. Offset a duck egg colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen, setting the chenille satin amidst painted walls and cream or wooden units.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Blend style and class with durable usability with the ecowood deluxe in chenille satin, a designer-style, wooden venetian blind with a matt cream finish. This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination. Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.

relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the amor soft peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Full of the joys of spring this vivacious valencia spring green vertical blind will bring colour and life into your home. It's a rich, earthy tone that provides a natural element and will easily pair with grey neutrals or olive hues for a coordinated look. A vertical blind is the full of the joys of spring this vivacious valencia spring green vertical blind will bring colour and life into your home.
